Name: Random Blacksmith Game
About the game: Jump into a fictionalized and dramatized medieval village as the village's blacksmith. Craft weapons to sell to adventurers, go into the caves to mine for metals, live through wars and much more in this wacky medieval adventure! Gameplay Tips The more weapons you produce, the more adventures can clear the mines of goblins Less goblins = more higher quality metals Gather weapons from fallen soldiers during wars to sell in your store Don't be scared of the goblins, be scared of going back to get your loot
